name: Deep Wreck
description:
Explore a shipwreck as a diver in this short horror game.

Benjamin Ryanson is a marine biologist spending his days diving around many of Costa Rica's small islands. One day, he discovers a mysterious shipwreck that he needs to explore. 

Dive deep into a shipwreck and discover the ship's mystery and its secret. 

This short 2D game was made in 14 days for Senscape's Cursed Adventurous Jam with Unreal Engine 5. 

For most of the team, this was their first Game Jam or gig in the game dev world.

We are very proud of the work we've done and hope you will enjoy the game too.

Development team:

Petra Zegnal - Environment Art + Character, User Interface, Storyline, Itch page

Kim André Sand - Game design and implementation

Joshua Thomas - Sound design/SFX

FlossySounds -  Music
